member.name: P:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpContext.CoreHttpContext
member.summary: Gets the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext for the executing action.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpContext.Request
member.summary: Gets the System.Web.HttpRequest object for the current HTTP request.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpContext.Response
member.summary: Gets the System.Web.HttpResponse object for the current HTTP response.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpContext.Cache
member.summary: Gets the System.Web.Caching.Cache object for the current application domain.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpContext.Session
member.summary: Gets the System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState object for the current HTTP request.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpContext.Server
member.summary: Gets the System.Web.HttpServerUtility object that provides methods used in processing Web requests.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpCookieCollection.CoreCookies
member.summary: Gets the collection of Cookies for this request.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpCookieCollection.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the cookie with the specified name from the cookie collection.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys
member.summary: Gets a string array containing all the keys (cookie names) in the cookie collection.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpCookieCollection.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of key/value pairs contained in the System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase instance.

member.summary: Gets the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest object for this request.

member.summary: Gets or set the RequestBody Stream.

member.summary: Gets the query value collection parsed from Request.QueryString.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString
member.summary: Gets the collection of HTTP query string variables.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpRequest.paramss
member.summary: Gets a combined collection of System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString and System.Web.HttpRequest.Body items.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpRequest.form
member.summary: Gets a collection of form variables.

member.summary: Gets or set the HTTP method.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Content-Type header.

member.summary: Gets the caching policy (such as expiration time, privacy settings, and vary clauses) of a Web page.

member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP status code of the output returned to the client.

member.summary: Adds an HTTP header to the output stream.

member.summary: Adds an HTTP header to the output stream.

member.summary: Writes a string of binary characters to the HTTP output stream.

member.summary: Clears all content output from the buffer stream.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpServerUtility.MapPath(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the physical file path in the application content folder that corresponds to the specified virtual path on the Web server.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.System.Web.HttpServerUtility.MapRootPath(System.String)
